mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the Fedrizziidae (Acari: Mesostigmata: Fedrizzioidea)

tax:div.tax:p: 1. Femur III and IV with large lamellae, setapv1 thickened. Pedofossae III present. Exopodal patterning between CxII–III striped.AnimaliaArachnidaAraneaeIdiopidaeIdiosomagenusIdiosoma1260 long.Papua New Guinea............AnimaliaArachnidaMesostigmataFedrizziidaeFedrizziascutataspeciesWomersleyFedrizzia scutata (Womersley)
